entity.name: Russian authorities target Chinese nationals with raids and facial recognition technology amid coronavirus fears
entity.description: According to the Associated Press, authorities in Moscow are tracking Chinese nationals and conducting raids as part of their virus prevention strategy. Transportation workers were also ordered to notify police if passengers who might be from China boarded. Some critics have called the strategy a form of racial profiling rather than an effective method to control the spread of the disease.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump Thank you. We would learn Russia Government how they prevent coronavirus spreading.
